AerosondeParameters.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 #Parameters for the Aerosonde UAV
00004 #as provided in the book Small Unmanned Aircraft - Theory and Practice by Beard and McLain
00005 #modifications in some signs have been made. Please compare with the original
00006 import rospy
00007 
00008 
00009 #World Parameters
00010 def worldParams():
00011         rospy.set_param('simRate', 1000)
00012         rospy.set_param('world/rho', 1.2682) #Air density
00013         rospy.set_param('world/oswald', 0.9)
00014         rospy.set_param('world/g',9.81)
00015 
00016 #Airframe Aerodynamic Parameters
00017 def planeParams():
00018         rospy.set_param('airframe/m', 13.5)
00019         rospy.set_param('airframe/j_x', 0.8244)
00020         rospy.set_param('airframe/j_y', 1.135)
00021         rospy.set_param('airframe/j_z', 1.759)
00022         rospy.set_param('airframe/j_xz', 0.1204)
00023         rospy.set_param('airframe/s', 0.55)
00024         rospy.set_param('airframe/b', 2.8956)
00025         rospy.set_param('airframe/c', 0.18994)
00026         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_lift_0', 0.28)
00027         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_drag_0', 0.03)
00028         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_m_0', -0.02338)
00029         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_lift_a', 3.45)
00030         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_drag_a', 0.3)
00031         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_m_a', -0.38)
00032         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_lift_q', 0)
00033         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_drag_q', 0)
00034         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_m_q', -10)
00035         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_lift_deltae', 0.36)
00036         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_drag_deltae', 0)
00037         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_m_deltae', -0.5)
00038         rospy.set_param('airframe/mcoeff', 50)
00039         rospy.set_param('airframe/alpha_stall', 0.4712)
00040         rospy.set_param('airframe/eps', 0.1592)
00041         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_drag_p', 0.0437)
00042         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_n_deltar', -0.08)
00043         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_y_0', 0)
00044         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_l_0', 0)
00045         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_n_0', 0)
00046         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_y_b', -0.98)
00047         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_l_b', -0.12)
00048         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_n_b', 0.25)
00049         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_y_p', 0)
00050         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_l_p', -1.0)
00051         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_n_p', 0.022)
00052         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_y_r', 0)
00053         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_l_r', 0.14)
00054         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_n_r', -1)
00055         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_y_deltaa', 0)
00056         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_l_deltaa', 0.08)
00057         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_n_deltaa', 0.006)
00058         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_y_deltar', 0.17)
00059         rospy.set_param('airframe/c_l_deltar', 0.005)
00060 
00061 #Airframe Propulsion Parameters
00062 def motorParams():
00063         rospy.set_param('motor/s_prop', 0.2027)
00064         rospy.set_param('motor/k_motor', 80)
00065         rospy.set_param('motor/k_t_p', 0)
00066         rospy.set_param('motor/k_omega', 0)
00067         rospy.set_param('motor/c_prop', 1.0)
00068 
00069 
00070 if __name__=="__main__":
00071         worldParams()
00072         planeParams()
00073         motorParams()
